author: El Jugador Escaldenc

text: I love this theme when you're shopping at Vincent's place with his overpriced potions. One of﻿ the reasons I love it is because the synths remind me of Secret of the Stars, a pretty terrible snes RPG I have fond memories of. I went through that game with my brother when I was 10 years old, we rented it before going to our grandparents' house for 2 weeks, far from any big cities,﻿ during winter. We'd play in the snow all day then come back inside and play it while warming up.
author: SupraDarky
